ftbquests.chapter.classes_introduction.q: Prodigium Reforged has &6three main branches&r, &9mage&r, &aranged&r and &dmelee&r.
This class is the tankiest class in the pack, it's aimed at tanking and helping others by healing, buffing and crowdcontrol.
&l&3狂战士&r&r
能打出巨量伤害方便你战斗爽，不过防御比较低，狂战士的目标就是杀杀杀杀杀杀杀！
&l&9&n法师&r&r&r
对于&9法师&r来说，有两条职业道路可选：
&l&1巫师&r&r
经典款的法师，通常用法术直接造成伤害，不过按照你选的法术种类还有不同的变化。
&e&l牧师&r&r
主攻治疗的职业，可以给你和你的朋友治疗和套buff，神圣魔法专精。
&l&a&n远程&r&r&r
&6如果要打开技能树&r，&6按下键盘上的i键&r即可，不过你还需要&e技能点&r才能点技能。
&a远程&r只有一个（目前来说）可选的职业：
&2&l游侠&r&r
可以在安全范围内朝敌人放冷箭，还能让宠物上去干架！
&e技能点&r需要杀怪（经验点足够就能获得技能点）获得，或者你也可以选择打boss，这样可以直接获得2点&e技能点&r。
选择&6职业&r后就可以选择对应的&6职业分支&r，但是你每个职业&c只能选择一个分支&r。
选择完职业的分支后，就会解锁&6一条新的技能树&r，在这个技能树里头还有&6三个次级职业&r可选，但是也是&c一次只能选一条&r。
右转接着了解更多关于职业的信息—>
&l&d&n近战&r&r&r
对于&d近战&r来说，有两条职业道路可选：
&l&e剑士&r&r
看我看我看我！！
当你成功读懂了下面的说明文字后，就点我！
职业介绍
你现在成功解锁了&6狂战士任务线&r，在任务书里头就可以查看！
It will help you know which armors and more to craft!
You've chosen the Berserker class!
You now have unlocked &6the Crusader quest chapter&r. Check it out in the quest book!
It will help you know which armors and more to craft next!

You've chosen the Wizard class!
You now have unlocked &6the Cleric quest chapter&r. Check it out in the quest book!
It will help you know which armors and more to craft next!
You've chosen the Cleric class!
Used for Mage (wizard and cleric)
You will drop&7 Scrolls&r in chest, those are a one time use spells unless you put them in a spellbook.
To do that, you will need to craft an &3Inscription Table&r and have a &6Spell Book&r.
Put the &6Spell Book&r and the &7Scroll&r in the &3Inscription table&r, you will then be able to use the spells as much as you have enough mana.

ftbquests.chapter.farming.quest35.descri: &9夏季&r是温带群系的第二个季节。
地上的草和树叶都会微微地发黄绿色，而且&9夏天&r时暴风雨更常见一些。
ftbquests.chapter.farming.quest35.title: 戴好你的太阳镜！
ftbquests.chapter.farming.quest36.descri: &6秋季&r是温带生物群系的第三个季节。
草的颜色会开始泛黄，树叶的颜色变成橙色，看上去还挺灿烂的。
生物群系的气温随后会逐渐下降，最后就到了&3冬季&r。
ftbquests.chapter.farming.quest36.title: 落叶
ftbquests.chapter.farming.quest37.descri: &3冬季&r是温带群系的第四个季节。
气温下降，随之而来的就是降雪，就连那些平常不会降雪的群系也能沾点光。
&3冬季&r的降水会上升，不过暴风雨就别想了。
ftbquests.chapter.farming.quest37.title: 这个时候坐屋里喝杯热巧克力最爽啦！
ftbquests.chapter.farming.quest38.descri: &5春季&r是温带生物群系的第一个季节，也是一年的开头。
草和树叶的绿色都变得微微发蓝，&3冬季&r所带来的低气温也会开始回升。
&3冬季&r下的雪会融化，&5春季&r的降水更频繁。
ftbquests.chapter.farming.quest38.title: 祥和的开端
ftbquests.chapter.farming.quest39.title: 别靠太近了！

ftbquests.chapter.npc__testing_phase.que: &dThe NPC system is still a work in progress.&r
&6Put the template&r in the house(or outside/in a cave/whatever you built) and &eright click&r when the position of the template is good.
When &6the template is fully built&r, &6go back to the quest&r and press &e"Click to submit"&r.
You will &2need to build homes&r for different npc and to defend them if needed.
The furniture you will need are crafted through the &cFurniture Station&r.
To make a &6suitable house&r, you will need &6chose the NPC quest&r, then &6click "show structure"&r.
&6The template of the furnitures&r needed will then &6be shown&r, &6build it&r in a house of your choosing.
When the &6template has been built&r, go &6back on the quest&r, and &6click "submit structure"&r(do it while INSIDE the home). The NPC will now spawn.
You will then be able to trade with this NPC and more :D
&6Select the quest&r and press &e"Click to show structure"&r.
这个NPC会销售召唤&5传送门&r的物品。
It also sell &6uncraftable items&r such as the Nature Compass, Waystones, Storages and Backpack Upgrades etc...
Create a home for the Merchant to spawn in.
Show the template with by clicking on the quest and then submit your build to make the npc spawn.
A lot of the decoration/furniture you use are crafted through the &cFurniture Station&r.
The NPC will have information about different things.
This is still an early build of the NPCs, The Guide will improve by a lot each updates.

ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest1.descript: With a &6mage spell book&r press &6"R"&r to switch your spells.
Open the &6world map&r with &6","&r key (or "m" key, depend on your keyboard layout)
You can use &3The Guide&r to learn more about bosses and more. It acts as a wiki if needed.
By &6defeating bosses&r you will &6unlock&r &3new ores generating&r in the world, &3new mobs spawning&r and &3harder difficulty&r.
You will also slowly gain &3Experience Points&r by &6killing mobs&7 AND&r by &6completing quests&r, you will then be able to &3choose a class&r in the Skill Tree (&6default key: "i"&r).
There are &6npcs&r that works like in Terraria, check the &2NPC chapter&r in the &2Quest Book&r to know more.
&3Three main stages&r are available in Prodigium Reforged. &3New mobs&r will also spawn in the world after defeating certain bosses, messages will appear in the chat to notice you about it.
&3Normal Mode&r : automatically unlocked when you first enter the world.
&4Expert Mode&r : unlocked when entering the nether for the first time. Mobs will have more dmg, spawn in groups, the player will receive Bleeding II and more
&9Master Mode&r : Mobs will deal even more dmg, players will receive Bleeding III and more...
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest1.subtitle: Read me! (it's important and not long)
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest1.title: Obtain a log
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest10.title: Obtain an enchanting table
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest11.descrip: Weapons, tools and armors have randomly attributes attributed to it. You can change the attributes by using the &cReforging Station&r.
To &6reforge&r the Modifier, use &6the correspondig material&r and/or use an &eAmbrosium Shard&r that acts as a universal reforge item.
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest11.title: Craft a Reforging Station
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest12.title: Craft a backpack
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest13.descrip: Prodigium Reforged has three main classes you can pick from, &6mage&r, &6melee&r and &6ranged&r.
Those classes have subclasses in them as well.
&6Each class has armors&r for it, you can unlock them in the skill tree AND by progressing.
Check the details in the "Classes" section of the quest book.
You can &7unlock&r new ores by &cdefeating bosses&r!
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest13.title: Make a choice
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest14.title: Protect yourself
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest15.descrip: A lot of different upgrades are available for your backpacks!
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest15.title: Upgrade your backpack !
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest16.descrip: You can find the Dead King corpse laying in the &2Catacombs&r
If you're having &ctrouble with the bosses&r, you can always craft some &3custom golems&r to &3help you&r!
Use the &9Extra Golems Guide&r (rewarded through The Conjurer quest) for more information.
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest17.descrip: You can use it to remove the enchant of a weapon to then put it in a book.
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest17.title: Craft a disenchanter
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest18.descrip: You can upgrade the size of your backpack.
When you want to upgrade your backpack, it must be empty before using it in a crafting table.
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest18.title: Bigger backpack
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest19.title: Even bigger
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest2.descript: The &4Expert Mode&r is automatically unlocked when you enter the Nether.
Prepare yourself &cbefore&r entering the Nether. The &4Expert Mode&r will make the game &charder&r!
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest20.title: Storage overload
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest21.descrip: Found in his village, the &2Umvuthana Grove&r.
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest22.descrip: You can create homes for NPC to spawn in.
They will trade useful items and more, check the NPC tab quests.
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest22.task_+6: Make some room in your base!
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest3.descript: Craft a &9Slime Crown&r to invoke the boss
As a reward, you will get an &bExplorer Compass&r to help you explore.
The &bExplorer Compass&r can be used to &7search&r for &6ANY&r structures that spawns in the world.
If you lose it you will need to trade with the Merchant NPC.
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest4.descript: Use an &9Undead Battle Standard&r or defeat 125 undeads to invoke the Undead Army.
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest5.descript: You can search through the &bExplorer's Compass&r &2The Theatre&r structure to find it!
You can also ask the guide for a map to the closest &2The Theatre&r structure.
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest7.descript: 你现在还不懂得怎么使用附魔台，所以现在附魔方式只有铁砧和&6附魔书&r。
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest7.title: 做一个铁砧
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest8.descript: Congratulation! You can now mine and use &2Adamantium&r and &4Palladium&r.
This is the first time you have &7unlocked new ores&r. It will now &6generate in the world&r meaning that you might find the new ores in &6places&r where &6you've already been to&r.
Don't hesitate to take a look into your old mines!
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest8.title: 你现在成功解锁了新矿物
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest9.descript: Congratulation! You can now mine and use &3diamonds&r and &5orichalcum&r to craft armors/tools and a ton of other stuff
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.quest9.title: 你现在成功解锁&3钻石&r了！
ftbquests.chapter.test_3.title: 普通模式
